ModMetaData.name: Base Robots [1.1]
ModMetaData.author: OdysseyScorpio
ModMetaData.description:
This is meant to be used by other modders who want to create their own custom robots.
Special thanks to Haplo_X1 - I relied heavily on his mod Misc. Robots Original Mod by ArcaneChill - I have only updated this to be compatible with RimWorld 1.1
